description:
Tree works to side and front gardens subject to LBI TPO No. 120 1991. 

 Works:  Plane (T1) [adjacent to building]:-         Crown lift to 6m., remove horizontal laterals         growing directly towards and over building to allow         a clearance of 2m., deadwood. 

         Plane (T9) [corner of Amwell Street and Hardwick                    Street]         Crown lift over adjacent site to 15m., remove         horizontal laterals only growing over site to         accommodate scaffolding. 

         Plane (T9) [adjacent to Pumping Station]         Crown lift over adjacent site to 15m., remove         horizontal laterals only growing over site to         accommodate scaffolding.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
